column4: Heya do you guys know why when I run ettercap to monitor it says to chose an interface? I ran this in backtrack and it works fine! The comand is this:  ettercap -P -q -p -M ARP // //0
it's asking you howto choose network interface, such as eth0, eth1 etc.
If im using wireless should I type -i wlan0
ifconfig wlan0 and see if its assigned an ip, if it is, then yes
